document_data.name: Translations from Kara-Tur Haiku
document_data.author: [[Lhaeo]] of [[Shadowdale]] (scribe)
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Translations from Kara-Tur Haiku''''' was a book written by [[Lhaeo]] of [[Shadowdale]] in [[1354 DR]]. In three volumes, it comprised translations of haiku poetry from [[Kara-Tur]].{{Cite web/The Candlekeep Collection}}

A copy was kept in the great fortress-library of [[Candlekeep]] around [[1372 DR]].
